children.name: heading
children.description: A heading that is 20-40 characters long that describes the page, which is a landing page where someone would describe their product offerings.

children.name: description
children.description: A few sentences that describes the page, which is a landing page where someone would describe their product offerings.

children.name: image
children.description: An image that displays in the hero banner of the page to the right of the heading and description.

children.name: button_text
children.description: The button text that describes the call to action the user should take.

children.name: button_link
children.description: The URL that a user should be taken to when they click the button.
